text:
Thomas Stewart "Tom" Udall (born May 18, 1948) is an American politician. He was the United States Senator from New Mexico from 2009 to 2021 and a member of the Democratic Party. First elected to the Senate in 2008, he represented as a member of the United States House of Representatives from 1999 to 2009. He was the Attorney General of New Mexico from 1991 to 1999.
On March 25, 2019, Udall announced that he would not run for re-election in 2020.
